alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 11:09AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rich... northeastern Salt Lake...southeastern Davis...central Morgan and northwestern Summit Counties through NOON MDT... At 1108 AM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Bountiful, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Bountiful, Morgan, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, East Canyon State Park, Emigration Canyon, Henefer, Portersville, Echo, Richville, Emory, Croydon, University Of Utah, Echo Reservoir and Sugarhouse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 311 and 319. Interstate 84 between mile markers 102 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 166 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
